reviews.review: Worth a quick playthrough, but portal 2 is miles better

This game is one of the staples of puzzle-based adventure games of the 21st century. The humor is still on point to this day and the minimalist approach of the game with you and GlaDOS makes it feel that much more claustrophobic. A lot of innovative gameplay that made Valve the company people remember them for.
Great game fuck you test chamber 18

What is there to say, It's Portal.

[spoiler] it's an essential for pc gaming, buy it.

Why are you here? You don't need further reassurance.
Probably one of those games that I feel like every gamer should play at least once. Definitely one of the best puzzle games out there with the bonus of a great story/music too.
Portal is a great puzzle game and is quite challenging while having simple mechanics. Sadly, I finished it in one sitting, so keep in mind that the game is pretty short.

Highly original game with a great story and well written funny dialog. A must for every PC gamer, plus the game is only around 2-3 hours to complete, so can be done in a single sitting. Goes on sale for like one pound, well worth it. One of valves best games!
intresting game mecahnic, great SFX, nice story and love the music at the end

This is the dark souls of portal games

Portal review
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Pros:
+First-person game
+Neat idea with portals and portal guns (so i guess it is a first-person shooter)
+The cake is a lie
+End song is great
+Classic
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Cons:
-Short (2.5-4 hours)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Do I recommend Portal?
Yes

Despite it's age, if you legitimately haven't ever played Portal for some reason or it somehow isn't in your library already, this is 100% a staple for everyone to own and play through.  Like seriously, at this point you should know the premise of the game so I don't need to explain much.  If you haven't played this yet, FIX THAT **** RIGHT NOW.
Just as good as I remember! The challenge modes are pretty tough.

good but very short. it took about 2 hours to beat including all the extra achievements you can get on your first play through. this felt more like an extended tech demo than a full game because of how short it is and because it has basically no story. portal 2 is definitely the full experience, but this is also worth playing.

Everybody knows and everybody loves Portal. You can‚Äôt really hate this game if you are any type of puzzle fan. The portal mechanic was something completely new when the game came out and it still holds up to this day. The gameplay and puzzle solving is pretty unique and makes you think outside of the box. In addition to that, you also get a humorous story narration along the way.

My main complaint is that the puzzles are too easy and can be solved rather quickly without much thought, there isn‚Äôt much satisfaction in completing the game. The game is also very short, it can be completed within 4 hours. To me, Portal seems like more of a proof of concept for its eventual sequel that has way more content. Still though it is fun to play through.
